traits.name: Blood Frenzy
entries: The high priestess has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

traits.name: Limited Amphibiousness
entries: The high priestess can breathe air and water, but she needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

traits.name: Shark Telepathy
entries: The high priestess can magically command any shark within 120 feet of her, using a limited telepathy.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The high priestess makes two attacks with her toothsome staff, or one attack with her bite and one with her claws.

actions.name: Toothsome Staff
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d8 + 2 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2 damage) slashing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The high priestess is a 7th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). She has the following cleric spells prepared:
